apps.title: IPTV Player - Smart Live TV
apps.summary: Stream Online TV - Watch Live IPTV Playlist & Channel with Built-In Player
apps.description:
üì∫ Smart IPTV Player is the ultimate way to stream live content from IPTV Channels and online playlists. Now you can enjoy your favorite online TV channels anytime, anywhere with the IPTV Smart Player. Get ready to immerse yourself in one of the best IPTV Online apps while sipping your favorite drink.

*** NEW üî•üî•üî• Xtreme Play is Now Available - Access Premier IPTV Service with over 20,000 Live Channels, VOD, EPG, and more.

*** Smart IPTV Player is designed to be user-friendly and simple to use. It provides a helpful guide to import your playlist and offers tutorials for online search, supporting M3U and M3U8 files.

*** With Online IPTV, you have unlimited access to a wide range of content and live channels from around the world. Whether you prefer traditional television or modern channels, you'll find them all here.

*** TV online allows you to enjoy your favorite content from a distance and supports a wide range of formats, ensuring you can watch your entertainment with ease.

*** Watch Live in style with high compatibility for video quality, including SD, HD, and 4K, as well as high resolutions like 720p and 1080p.

FEATURES:
üî• Xtreme IPTV support
üî• Easily import and manage playlists using Playlist URL
üî• Play single streams using M3U and M3U Plus files
üî• Add favorite channels and personalize your playlist
üî• Unlimited playlists and channels can be added
üî• Mirror-cast from your phone to the big screen
üî• Advanced tools such as timer, brightness, volume control, lock screen, and more
üî• Built-in IPTV player for fast, reliable, and stable streaming
üî• External IPTV player support for playing media from your device, including images, videos, files, and URLs
üî• Smart IPTV supports playlist formats like M3U and M3U Plus
üî• Fast channel search and compatibility with all Android devices and TV Boxes

DISCLAIMER:

Smartplayer IPTV does not contain any pre-loaded playlists or channels
Users must import their own content
Xtreme IPTV Smart Player is not affiliated with any third-party providers
We do not support or promote streaming copyrighted material without proper permission from the copyright holders.
IMPORTANT: The IPTV Smart Player App only displays and plays the content that users add.

For more information, please check our Terms of Use: Terms of Use - Metaverse Labs
To understand how we handle your privacy, please read our Privacy Policy: Privacy Policy - Metaverse Labs

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please contact us at support@metaverselabs.ai. We value your input and are dedicated to improving the Smart IPTV Player - Xtreme HD IPTV - Online TV - Watch Live experience.

apps.title: IPTV
apps.summary: Watch IPTV on your Android device
apps.description:
Watch IPTV from your Internet service provider or free live TV channels from any other source in the web.

Features:
 ‚úî M3U and XSPF playlists support
 ‚úî Playlists history
 ‚úî Playing multicast streams with UDP proxy (proxy need to be installed in your LAN)
 ‚úî Grid, list or tile view of TV channels
 ‚úî EPG support in XMLTV and JTV formats
 ‚úî Internal and external video players
 ‚úî Parental control

Additional features are available in Pro version:
 ‚úî Ad free
 ‚úî Start app on device boot option, useful for set-top boxes.
 ‚úî Auto-play last channel option
 ‚úî Extended playlists history

This app doesn't contain any built-in channels, you should have your playlist with TV channels to use this app.

For multicast streams it's recommended to use UDP proxy:
 * for Windows: download and install UDP-to-HTTP proxy from http://borpas.info/download/UdpProxy.exe or check the corresponding option while installing IP-TV Player http://borpas.info/iptvplayer
 * for Linux: install udpxy (http://udpxy.com/index-en.html, http://sourceforge.net/projects/udpxy/)
 * the best solution would be installing udpxy on your WLAN router, this can be done for DD-WRT (http://www.dd-wrt.com) and OpenWrt (https://openwrt.org) firmware
 * some WLAN routers have built-in udpxy in manufacturer's firmware

Please join translations project at https://crowdin.com/project/iptv/invite if you want to add new or improve existing translation.

apps.title: IPTV Player: Watch Live TV
apps.summary: Watch live TV online with IPTV player. Stream TV channels, support M3U playlists
apps.description:
Enjoy watching live TV online with a reliable TV streaming app. Use your own playlists to stream TV channels anytime, anywhere. This IPTV player supports M3U playlists and IPTV streams. Easily load and manage your personal TV playlists with a smooth and stable player. Use this online TV player to stream TV content on your device. A simple and powerful solution for TV streaming and online TV playback.

IMPORTANT: This IPTV player app doesn't supply or include any media content. We have no affiliation with any content providers and can't be responsible for the content provided by third parties.

Main Features:
- Support adding unlimited M3U/M3U8 streaming playlists. 
- Support Syncing IPTV playlist from our mobile version.
- Support adding Xtream Code Api.
- Support analyzing M3U/M3U8 formats with EPG information.
- Easily add M3U/M3U8 files from online websites & the local folders of your device.
- Watch IPTV live streams with built-in powerful IPTV Player.
- Cast to smart TVs enabled with Chromcast and get rid of small screens' limitations.
- Adjust playback ratio, volume and brightness per your habits and preferences.
- Screen locks to avoid its rotation when moving the phone.
- Fast search for channel and add it to Favorites with one tap.
- Quickly find the watched program from Recently Viewed.
- Automatically update your tivimate IPTV playlist.
- Watch live TV on the phone, tablet and Android TV.

How to add M3U/M3U8 files? 
- Click the "Add" button on the smarter player playlist page.
- Select "Add M3U link" and enter your M3U link in the input box.
- Wait for the loading to complete to watch live TV for free.

Advantages:
‚ñ∂Ô∏è The stream player app is compatible perfectly with phones, tablets and Android TV.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Our IPTV player works well with M3U and M3U8 playlists.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Add M3U and M3U8 links from online websites or local folders on your phone.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Watch multiple IPTV live sources by adding Xtream Code Api.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Watch live channels, EPG & check the current/next channel name, broadcast time & duration...
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Cast to Chromecast-enabled smart TVs with HD quality.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Change playback ratio, volume and brightness as you like.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Enter and search for your favorite channels with the phone keyboard fast and easily.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Save your favorite programs at any time on this super stream player.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Find shows you've watched to continue watching with just one click.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è You can enjoy high definition quality with fast buffering.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Our specially-designed user-friendly interface will make you master using the smart IPTV app in seconds.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Easy design and a few exquisite menu buttons make our IPTV stream player become easy to use. 

Note: 
Some links may be unavailable due to the expiration/invalidation or the server issue. In this case, you can try updating the link (Usually, we'll automatically update your channel list when you open your IPTV playlist for the first time every day.) or contact the provider to get the latest one or try again later.

Important Disclaimer:
- The IPTV player app doesn't contain any built-in channels.
- Users should have their own playlist with TV channels to use this m3u/m3u8 player app.
- This IPTV player doesn't offer any kind of IPTV services like IPTV subscriptions or streams.
- The IPTV xtream player doesn't provide any audiovisual content to the users.
- Users must provide their content .
- IPTV Player has no affiliation with any third-party provider.
- We don't support the streaming of copyright-protected material without permission of the copyright holder.
- We can't ensure every M3U/M3U8 playlists have EPG information, as it is provided by the network service provider.

Terms of Use: https://oliaviz.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://oliaviz.com/privacy

9Xtream, the ultimate solution for streaming your favorite content on your Android device. With 9Xtream, immerse yourself in a world of entertainment where you can seamlessly Download and Enjoy Movies, Series, Live TV, and Live Catchup from a variety of IPTV Service Providers, all on your Android Phone, Tablet, Android TV, and Android Boxes

Discover a myriad of features tailored to enhance your viewing experience:

Seamless Integration: Support for XTREAM CODES API and M3U Playlist ensures effortless compatibility with various IPTV services.
Versatile Streaming: Watch your preferred content in stunning quality, whether it's 720p, 1080p, HD, FHD, 4k, or 8k streams, tailored to your device's capabilities.
Extensive Customization: Tailor your experience with multiple playlists, themes, and settings adjustments, ensuring your preferences are always met.
Enhanced Functionality: Benefit from features like ChromeCast support, EPG TV Program Guide, Picture-in-picture mode, and Parental Control for a personalized viewing experience.
Comprehensive Information: Delve into detailed insights about Movies and Series, including Duration, Director, Genre, Cast with images, and Crew bios, enriching your understanding of your favorite content.
User-Centric Design: Enjoy an intuitive and touch-friendly interface designed for seamless navigation, even with remote controls.
9Xtream offers a diverse range of language options to cater to global audiences, including English, Arabic, French, German, and many more, ensuring accessibility for users worldwide.

Disclaimer:

2. 9Xtream operates independently of any third-party providers and does not endorse the streaming of copyrighted material without proper authorization.

Please Note:
1. 9Xtream does not supply or include any media or content; users must add their own playlists or streaming URLs that they have permission to stream.
2. We do not promote or facilitate access to copyrighted material, IPTV subscriptions, or copyrighted streams.

Experience the pinnacle of IPTV streaming with 9Xtream ‚Äì your gateway to limitless entertainment possibilities

apps.description:
Disclaimer:
IPTV Smarter Player does not host, provide, or contain any media or data. We solely serve as a player tool to facilitate the playback of data provided by users. It is the responsibility of users to provide their own data. Additionally, Smarter Player has no affiliation with any third-party data providers. Users are advised to add services from their respective service providers for streaming URLs or any other type of URLs they wish to stream, including user IDs, passwords, all identifying information, URLs, or m3u playlists. We strongly discourage the use of any illegal IPTV services.

This app simply displays the data added by the user and plays the user's data within the confines of the app.

About App:
IPTV player is a convenient media player which enables users to play M3U & M3U8 files. And it can work perfectly on all devices. You can add your interested video source M3U & M3U8 files from online or your local folders and play with its built-in player to enjoy your ultimate IPTV stream player experience! IPTV player allow users to play there own IPTV playlist and play Live TV Channel, Movies, Series, and TV Catchup.

Main Features:
- Support adding unlimited M3U streaming playlists.
- EPG support in XMLTV and JTV formats
- Favorite collection, channel history & lock channel with passcode.
- Easily add M3U files from online websites & the local folders of your device.

- With built-in powerful IPTV Player.
- Cast to smart TVs enabled with Chromecast & AirPlay and get rid of small screens' limitations.
- Adjust playback ratio, volume and brightness per your habits and preferences.
- Screen locks to avoid its rotation when moving the phone.
- Fast search for channel and add it to Favorites with one tap.
- Quickly find the watched program from Recently Viewed.
- Automatically update your playlist.

IPTV Smart Player can play extensions such as mqv, pls, aifc, m4r, wav, 3gp, 3g2, flac, avi, m2a, aac, mpa, xhe, m3u, mov, aiff, ttml, vtt, m4v, amr, caf, m4a, m4b, mp4, mp1, m1a, mp4, aax, mp2, w64, aa, mp3, itt, au, eac3, webvtt, vtt, ac3, m4p, loas and Live stream IPTV support.

You can upgrade to Premium with onetime payment or buy subscription options:
- a lifetime subscription
- a monthly subscription (which comes with a 3-day free trial).
- a weekly subscription

apps.title: Zen IPTV Player
apps.summary: Your IPTV, simplified.
apps.description:
The smartest and most beautiful IPTV player application!

L'application de lecture IPTV la plus belle et intelligente !

Zen IPTV Player charge vos contenus et les affiche dans une interface claire et soign√©e digne des plus grandes plateformes de SVOD. Il s'agit de la seule application de ce standard disponible sur tous vos appareils. Commencez √† regarder sur la TV puis finissez sur le t√©l√©phone, la tablette ou votre ordinateur !

Zen IPTV Player  loads your content and displays it in a clear, polished interface worthy of the biggest SVOD platforms. It's the only app of this quality standard available on all your devices! Start watching on your TV and then finish later on your computer, tablet or phone!

All the basic functions of an IPTV playback application are available: 

- TV channels, Catchup, Movies and Series.
- 4K, HDR and Dolby Vision support.
- Multi-language subtitles and audio tracks.
- EPG: Electronic Program Guide (TV Guide).

Plus features never seen before in the IPTV world:

- Picture in Picture.
- Automatic grouping of different versions of a movie, series or TV channel (SD, HD, FHD, etc.).
- Popular movies and series.
- Latest films and series added.

Finally, with Zen Access IAP you can give your IPTV superpowers:

- Create multiple watch profiles for your whole family.
- Resume movies and series you watch where you left off.
- Add movies, series and TV channels to your favorites lists.
- Compositions, statistics and scores of Football matches.
- Available on all your devices with the same account!



IMPORTANT / LEGAL: Zen IPTV Player does not and will never provide any content for viewing. The application allows you to play video sources, just as a browser allows you to display web pages. However, you must not use Zen IPTV Player to play sources to which you do not have the rights, under penalty of prosecution by the rights holders. Zen IPTV Player does not endorse illegal IPTV subscriptions.

apps.title: TiviMate IPTV Player
apps.summary: Video player for IPTV
apps.description:
Cut the cords, not the experience. Enjoy effortless live TV on Android TV with TiviMate IPTV Player.

Easy to use for beginners and deeply customizable for power users, TiviMate blends speed, clarity, and control into a seamless viewing experience.

Key features:
- Refined, intuitive and customizable interface tailored for large screens
- Support for common IPTV playlist formats: M3U, Xtream Codes, Stalker Portal 
- Multiple playlists: Effortlessly manage and switch between channel playlists
- Favorite channels: Bookmark your most-watched channels for instant access
- Catch-up: Access past broadcasts so you never miss a show
- Recording: Record your favorite shows to watch later
- Search: Find channels and shows instantly with intuitive search
- Parental controls: Manage access easily to ensure a safe viewing environment
- Multiview: Watch multiple channels at once on a single screen
- And much more

Device compatibility:
TiviMate is designed for Android TV and remote control navigation. It is not optimized for touch devices such as phones or tablets.

IMPORTANT
TiviMate is a media player only and does not provide any TV content. To watch live TV or VOD, you will need a playlist with channels from your IPTV service. TiviMate is not affiliated with any content provider and does not endorse the use of illegal content sources.
